appbar.title: Welcome
aboutMe.description:
Hi, my name is Nadine and I live in Berlin.
I am an open-minded person who likes to work in a team. I like to learn new things.
Home office has become an important factor for me.

I like to be involved myself and configure chatbots, modify websites or create wireframes.
aboutMe.lang.body:
- German, native language
- English, more confident in writing
aboutMe.skills.body:
- React, React-native, React-native-web
- Typescript, Javascript
- Accessibility
- Wireframing
timeline.job1.body:
Development of a cross platform application with reference to accessibility.

Typescript, React-native-web, React, Accessibility, Unit-Tests, Test-ID's

JIRA, Confluence, IntelliJ, TeamCity, Microsoft Office, Android Studio, xCode, Flipper, Appium Studio
timeline.job2.body:
Planning with the client, creating wireframes and writing proposals, as well as own programming of chatbots and landing pages.

JavaScript, React, Python, Chatbots, Wireframing

WordPress, Rasa, Dialogflow, XD, Balsamiq, Google Docs, Hubspot, Metabase
timeline.job3.body:
Development of a Progessive Web App (PWA) with an integrated chatbot. Also conception and design with wireframes. This also served for the bachelor thesis.

JavaScript, React

IBM Watson, Firebase, Sketch, Confluence, IntelliJ, Microsoft Office
timeline.job4.body:
Create mockups and provide project management support, such as research, estimating, and input into CMS.

Balsamiq, Microsoft Office, CMS Tools
timeline.job5.body: Market analysis and identification of potential customers and partners in the areas of marketing and employer branding.
